event.title: Treffen der lokalen Gruppe in Berlin, Deutschland

body.p: The Berlin group of the FSFE meets every 2nd Thursday of the month at Kieztreff Undine (Hagenstraße 57, 5 minutes from Lichtenberg U+S station). Anyone interested in Free Software is welcome to attend the meetings.

* When: 10.04.2025, 18:00 h
* Where: Kieztreff Undine, Hagenstraße 57 Berlin (S/U Lichtenberg station)
